TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LineJoinBevel extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlLeafElement

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is a:bevel.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)]
`bevel (Line Join Bevel)`
This element specifies a Bevel Line Join.
A bevel joint specifies that an angle joint is used to connect lines.
[*Example*:
9a805624-6405-4071-bf50-74600deb4465
*end example*]
|Parent Elements| |---------------------| |ln (§20.1.2.2.24); lnB (§21.1.3.5); lnBlToTr (§21.1.3.6); lnL (§21.1.3.7); lnR (§21.1.3.8); lnT (§21.1.3.9); lnTlToBr (§21.1.3.10); uLn (§21.1.2.3.14)|
[*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_LineJoinBevel) is located in §A.4.1. *end note*]
[!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
